name: Slurpee Ice drink maker - fun icy fruit soda and slushies dessert game for all age free
name_original: Slurpee Ice drink maker - fun icy fruit soda and slushies dessert game for all age free
description:
Hi

You've never tried a maker game like this before!

The game is hands down the best slush maker in the app store! With 40 different delicious flavors and dozens of unique decorations, you will have hours of fun with this game!

Choose from crazy flavors like:
- Cotton Candy!
- Key Lime Pie!
- Magic Potion!
- Tiger Blood!
- Wedding Cake!
- Witch's Brew!

Amazing Decorations like:
- Funny Faces!
- Ladybugs!
- Butterflies!
- Snowflakes!
- Lightning!

Plus you can share your Slushies with friends by email or on Facebook. Download this game now and start enjoying your own special slushie today!!
